mapper.insert: insert into sys_log(id, operate_date_time, create_date_time, create_user_id, update_date_time, update_user_id, user_id, biz_name, log_type, module_name, raw_data, target_data) value ( #{sysLog.id}, #{sysLog.operateDateTime}, #{sysLog.createDateTime}, #{sysLog.createUserId}, #{sysLog.updateDateTime}, #{sysLog.updateUserId}, #{sysLog.userId}, #{sysLog.bizName}, #{sysLog.logType}, #{sysLog.moduleName}, #{sysLog.rawData}, #{sysLog.targetData})
